name: nxus-web
description: Base theme, template, and MVC support for Nxus applications

scripts.postversion: npm run build-docs && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register -R spec src/test/*.js src/modules/**/test/*.js
scripts.compile: rm -rf lib/; babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/modules/web-theme-default/assets; cp -r src/modules/web-theme-default/assets lib/modules/web-theme-default/; cp -r src/modules/web-theme-default/partials lib/modules/web-theme-default/; cp -r src/modules/web-theme-default/layouts lib/modules/web-theme-default/; npm run copyTemplates
scripts.copyTemplates: cp -r src/templates lib/; for each in `ls src/modules/`; do if [ -d src/modules/$each/templates ]; then cp -r src/modules/$each/templates lib/modules/$each; fi; done;
scripts.postpublish: npm run build-docs && npm run publish-docs
scripts.build-docs: export NAME=`npm view . name`; export VERSION=`npm view . version`; documentation readme ./src/index.js --name $NAME --project-version $VERSION --readme-file ./README.md -s $NAME
scripts.publish-docs: npm run build-docs && git add ./README.md && git commit -m 'Updated README API Docs' && git push
